text: Harry and Tonto is a 1974 American comedy drama movie directed by Paul Mazursky and starring Art Carney, Herbert Berghof, Ellen Burstyn, Geraldine Fitzgerald, Larry Hagman, Chief Dan George, Melanie Mayron, Cliff DeYoung. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for 2 Oscars and won Academy Award in 1975. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1974 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Paul Mazursky
title: Harry and Tonto
